SQL> declare
2
3 vblob1 blob;
4
5 BEGIN
6
7 select leftiriscode INTO vblob1 FROM irisdata WHERE irisid=1;
8
9 dbms_output.put_line(rawtohex(vblob1));
10
11
12 dbms_output.put_line(UTL_RAW.CAST_TO_binary_integer(vblob1));
13
14
15 END;
16 /

07333771272398091

int bitsoncount(unsigned x)
{
    unsigned int b=0;
    if(x > 1)
        b=1;    
    while(x &= (x - 1))
        b++;    
    return b;
}

def bitsoncount(x):
b=0;
if(x>1):
b=1;
while(x &= (x-1)):
